message.name: LEARNING_1_TURN_1_N1_TEXT
message.value: Welcome to Wormix - a rough and dangerous world! There's no time for wasting, straight to business!

message.name: LEARNING_1_TURN_1_N2_PART_1_TEXT
message.value: First, you msut learn how to move around and get yourself a weapon. See the crate? There's a rifle in it. Come to the crate using

message.name: LEARNING_1_TURN_1_N2_PART_2_TEXT
message.value: buttons and take the weapon.

message.name: LEARNING_1_TURN_2_N1_PART_1_TEXT
message.value: Great! Now, shooting. If you don't know how to shoot, you'll be dead very fast. Aim with

message.name: LEARNING_1_TURN_2_N1_PART_2_TEXT
message.value: Aim straight at this marker.

message.name: LEARNING_1_TURN_3_TEXT
message.value: To shoot press SPACE.

message.name: LEARNING_1_TURN_4_TEXT
message.value: Holy sheep! Good shot! Nail down the success - try again.

message.name: LEARNING_1_TURN_5_TEXT
message.value: What a shot - your enemy wouldn't stand a chance! That's how we do it in Wormix. Congratulations - you've just accomplished your first mission!

message.name: LEARNING_2_TURN_1_PART_1_TEXT
message.value: What are you going to do when you get in such place? Jump!

message.name: LEARNING_2_TURN_1_PART_2_TEXT
message.value: Go to the edge of platform.

message.name: LEARNING_2_TURN_1_PART_3_TEXT
message.value: Press the

message.name: LEARNING_2_TURN_1_PART_4_TEXT
message.value: button to jump forward.

message.name: LEARNING_2_TURN_2_TEXT
message.value: To get on the next platform, you shouldlearn a special jump: Backflip. Turn your back to the wall and press

message.name: LEARNING_2_TURN_3_TEXT
message.value: Good. There's a shotgun in this crate, take it.

message.name: LEARNING_2_TURN_4_TEXT
message.value: And now let's watch your weapon in action. Jump to the next platform and destroy the target!

message.name: LEARNING_2_TURN_5_TEXT
message.value: Target destroyed! Great job!

message.name: LEARNING_3_TURN_1_TEXT
message.value: The wind is the key to greatest shots. Depending on your skill, the wind can be your ally, but it also may become your foe.

message.name: LEARNING_3_TURN_2_TEXT
message.value: Here you can see the strength of wind and its direction.

message.name: LEARNING_3_TURN_3_PART1_TEXT
message.value: Lots of good weapons are affected by the wind. For example, bazooka.

message.name: LEARNING_3_TURN_3_PART2_TEXT
message.value: All your weapons are stored in the backpack. Click on this icon.

message.name: LEARNING_3_TURN_4_TEXT
message.value: Click on this icon to take the bazooka.

message.name: LEARNING_3_TURN_5_N1_PART_1_TEXT
message.value: To shoot the bazooka you should also adjust the power.

message.name: LEARNING_3_TURN_5_N1_PART_2_TEXT
message.value: Power is increasing by holding SPACE.

message.name: LEARNING_3_TURN_5_N2_TEXT
message.value: Here's your targe! Take aim at the marker and shoot with maximum force. Press and hold SPACE.

message.name: LEARNING_3_TURN_6_N1_TEXT
message.value: Target dispatched. Great job! Let's try again!

message.name: LEARNING_3_TURN_7_TEXT
message.value: Great, let's go forth. Not all the weapons are affected by the wind. Look, there's a grenade in your backpack, take it.

message.name: LEARNING_3_TURN_8_TEXT
message.value: You may set the explosion delay for the grenade with 1-5 keys. Now the timer is set for 3 seconds, which is perfect for the next target.

message.name: LEARNING_3_TURN_9_TEXT
message.value: Now it's your turn - take aim and throw the grenade with maximum power.

message.name: LEARNING_3_TURN_10_TEXT
message.value: Whoa! Seems like it's getting hot here, just don't go wild. It was your last training. Now you're on your own. Great battles are waiting!

message.name: LEARNING_MISSION_1_NAME
message.value: Training: Shooting

message.name: LEARNING_MISSION_2_NAME
message.value: Training: Jumping

message.name: LEARNING_MISSION_3_NAME
message.value: Training: Bazooka and grenade

message.name: LEARNING_MISSION_2_DESCR
message.value: Learn how to jump around the map.

message.name: LEARNING_MISSION_3_DESCR
message.value: Learn how to perform precise shots and use the wind.

message.name: BOSS_PIRATE_NAME
message.value: Pirate Gang

message.name: BOSS_PIRATE_DESCR
message.value: The Pirate Captain has sunken so many times, that he is not afraid of water anymore.

message.name: TEAM_NAME_PIRATE2
message.value: Cannon fodder

message.name: BOT_NAME_PIRATE3
message.value: Fallen sailor

message.name: BOSS_ILLUSIONIST_NAME
message.value: The Illusionist

message.name: BOSS_ILLUSIONIST_DESCR
message.value: It's hard to kill the Illusionist, when you don't know which one of them is real.

message.name: TEAM_NAME_ILLUSIONIST1
message.value: The Illusionist

message.name: BOSS_SHAMAN_NAME
message.value: Voodoo shaman

message.name: BOSS_SHAMAN_DESCR
message.value: Shaman relies on pesky demons, which may teleport anywhere, if you attack them

message.name: TEAM_NAME_SHAMAN1
message.value: Voodoo shaman

message.name: TEAM_NAME_SHAMAN2
message.value: Summoned forces

message.name: BOT_NAME_SHAMAN1
message.value: Voodoo shaman

message.name: BOT_NAME_SHAMAN2
message.value: Lesser demon

message.name: BOSS_VIKING_DESCR
message.value: You're fighting against 3 veterans and your time leaks away.

message.name: BOSS_WIND_MASTER_NAME
message.value: Wind Master

message.name: BOSS_WIND_MASTER_DESCR
message.value: Wind is not an ally anymore - it serves the Wind Master!

message.name: TEAM_NAME_WIND1
message.value: Wind Master

message.name: TEAM_NAME_WIND2
message.value: Master's Guard

message.name: BOT_NAME_WIND1
message.value: Wind Master

message.name: BOSS_SAMURAI_CAT_NAME
message.value: The Samurai

message.name: BOSS_SAMURAI_CAT_DESCR
message.value: This cat really has 9 lives! This duel's going to be a test of your endurance.

message.name: BOSS_MINER_NAME
message.value: The Miner

message.name: BOSS_MINER_DESCR
message.value: Genius of explosions, which base is well protected by enhanced mines.

message.name: BOSS_ELDER_DEMONS_NAME
message.value: Burning zombies

message.name: BOSS_ELDER_DEMONS_DESCR
message.value: This zombies were possesed by some powerful force. Are you prepared to meteor shower?

message.name: TEAM_NAME_ELDER_DEMONS
message.value: Burning zombies

message.name: BOSS_SOUL_NAME
message.value: Wandering spirit

message.name: BOSS_SOUL_DESCR
message.value: The Spirit heals his carriers while trying to escape you. Don't give him a chance.

message.name: BOSS_GHOST_NAME
message.value: Ancient ghost

message.name: BOSS_GHOST_DESCR
message.value: Malicious creature, who managed to subdue the energy of lightning. You simply don't have a chance.

message.name: TEAM_NAME_GHOST_MAIN
message.value: Ancient ghost

message.name: BOT_NAME_GHOST_MAIN
message.value: Ancient ghost

message.name: BOSS_YAKUZA_DESCR
message.value: The gang members are tightly linked to each other. By killing one of them, you make others stronger.

message.name: BOSS_ROMEO_JULIET_NAME
message.value: Romeo and Juliet

message.name: BOSS_ROMEO_JULIET_DESCR
message.value: One of the best mercenary teams. Noone has unraveled their secret yet.

message.name: BOSS_KING_DEAD_NAME
message.value: Zombie King

message.name: BOSS_KING_DEAD_DESCR
message.value: You think you can handke the horde of zombies and King's black magic?

message.name: TEAM_KING_DEAD_NAME
message.value: Zombie King

message.name: BOT_KING_DEAD_NAME
message.value: Zombie King

message.name: TEAM_KING_DEAD_MINIONS
message.value: King's guard

message.name: BOSS_DEAD_PIRATE_NAME
message.value: Vengeful Captain

message.name: BOSS_DEAD_PIRATE_DESCR
message.value: The Old Pirate has returned with extra powers! Revenge!

message.name: BOSS_SERGEANT_DESCR
message.value: Sergeant is protected by the loyal guard and brand new invisible guarding bots!

message.name: BOSS_FARMER_DESCR
message.value: It's not known exactly, what is grown by this Farmer, but he must be interrupted.

message.name: ENHANCEMENT_APPLE_NAME
message.value: Strange apple

message.name: BOSS_HUNTER_DESCR
message.value: The Hunter relies on his laser traps, which are impossible to escape from (as he thinks).

message.name: BOSS_MANIACS_DESCR
message.value: This creatures are skilled with their dreadful hooks - so keep the distance!

message.name: BOSS_GUARDIANS_DEPTHS_NAME
message.value: Guardians of Depths

message.name: BOSS_GUARDIANS_DEPTHS_DESCR
message.value: The Earth itself fights for the Guardians! Don't even try to attack without a strong team!

message.name: BOSS_ENGINEER_DESCR
message.value: Inventor, who created a vault in ancient tomb. First wrong action will lead to your defeat!

message.name: BOT_NAME_ENGINEER_DROID
message.value: Protective Droid

message.name: PROGRESS_BAR_ENGINEER
message.value: next droid

message.name: BOSS_DARK_KNIGHT_NAME
message.value: Dark knight

message.name: BOSS_DARK_KNIGHT_DESCR
message.value: Superior warrior protected by twilight. He creates his own army of acolytes with the only aim to destroy you!

message.name: BOSS_DARK_KNIGHT_TEAM_ACOLYTES
message.value: Dark acolytes

message.name: BOSS_PALADIN_DESCR
message.value: Warrior of light, wielding powerful nagic for both attack and defense. Still you have advantage in numbers.

message.name: BOSS_HACKER_DESCR
message.value: When engaged in combat, hacker relies on his protective field heavily. Seize control over generators and destroy him!

message.name: BOSS_THIEVES_NAME
message.value: Master thieves

message.name: BOSS_THIEVES_DESCR
message.value: They'll strip you of your weapons in a nick of time. And then you'll have to fight them with few remaining guns.

message.name: BOSS_THIEF_BOX
message.value: Stolen item

message.name: BOSS_PSIONICS_DESCR
message.value: Telepathist creates black holes, instantly destroying your units. Only ally's reflexes can save you!

message.name: BOSS_PHANTOMS_DESCR
message.value: These ghosts cause panic just with their presence! Even if you overcome a fear, what about clones of yourself?

message.name: BOSS_ARCHDEMON_DESCR
message.value: Lord of the local hell. Don't surprise, when you find yourself trapped and bound, on this territory he is almighty.
